item.title: Griffis Business Park Tour & Luncheon | July 16 (Registration Required)
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 16, 2025 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM - Join us for the 2025 Griffiss Business Park Student Tour on July 16 in Rome NY. This full day experience includes visits to leading tech and research organizations such as the Air Force Research Lab and Innovare Advancement Center. Students will also have the opportunity to connect with RPI alumni over a networking lunch at NYSTEC. Registration is required by June 15. Transportation is provided.

item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: Campus Cleanout Days Scheduled this Summer
item.description: Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) and Environmental & Site Services (E&SS) are partnering with the campus community to encourage cleanouts of cluttered storage areas, offices, shops, and labs. Take advantage of these free events to prepare your spaces for the upcoming fall semester!

item.title: Standing on the Shoulders of Heroes Pride Exhibit | June 16-July 13
item.description: Date: Monday, June 16, 2025 - Sun , July 13, 2025 (all day) - In celebration of Pride Month, the LGBTQ+ Task Force presents an exhibit celebrating heroes who have stood tall in the face of injustice. Please visit these posters on the main floor of Folsom Library. Each one shares the story of people who have risked much to speak for others. item.title: Food Drive to Support Campus food Pantry July 7th -11th
item.description:
Date: Monday, July 7, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM - Celebrating the 1 year Anniversary of the opening of our on-campus Food pantry, We will be holding a week long food drive. Collecting Non perishable food items and Personal Hygiene items for the Campus Pantry. Donations can be dropped of at Off campus Commons 1525 15th street or email offcampus@rpi.edu to have items picked up.
